description:
This course is for home and professional cooks who are interested in learning my secrets to preparing fresh and flavorful chicken soups, including a Classic Chicken Noodle Soup, a Coconut Thai Green Curry Chicken Stew, a Chicken Gumbo, and a Tortilla Soup!

The course is structured around each soup, and includes a recipe document for each soup with step-by-step instructions, along with a list of related course videos for each step with helpful tips.

Although each soup features a combination of flavors from different cultures, as you prepare the individual soups you'll learn how to consistently prepare moist chicken, how to layer flavors with rough and fine-chop aromatics, and tips on how to save time without sacrificing flavor.
title: Chicken Soup: Sarah's Secrets
